rulesLines: yesterday at midnight there was a crime commited at the Crimmson villa.
There are five prime suspects Plum, Mustard, Green, White, Scarlett, and Peacock!
According to forensics the crime was commited using Candlestick, Dagger, Lead Pipe, Revolver, Rope, or Spanner.
There are 9 rooms in the villa: Kitchen, Conservatory, Library, Dinning, Ballroom, Hall, Study, Lounge, Billiard
You have got 5 chances to guess! I am an optimist so I dont like negation.
If you fail you are out! forever...
